patterns_discovered.description: Initial setup phase for internationalization framework by installing core and React binding packages
patterns_discovered.context: This is the foundational step in implementing multi-language support

patterns_discovered.description: Dependencies are maintained in alphabetical order in package.json
patterns_discovered.context: i18next and react-i18next were inserted in correct alphabetical positions

patterns_discovered.description: All dependencies use caret (^) versioning for minor/patch updates
patterns_discovered.context: Consistent version management strategy across all packages

gotchas_discovered.description: Installing packages is only the first step; configuration files and integration code still needed
gotchas_discovered.context: Package installation alone does not enable i18n functionality - requires i18n config files, provider setup, and translation file structure

gotchas_discovered.description: i18next@23.7.0 and react-i18next@13.5.0 must be compatible with react@18.2.0
gotchas_discovered.context: No immediate issues evident, but version mismatch could cause runtime problems during integration

approach_outcome.summary: Successfully added react-i18next and i18next dependencies to the frontend project
approach_outcome.scope_completion: Subtask completed as specified - both packages installed with appropriate semantic versions

recommendations.description: Set up i18n.js or i18n.ts with language detection, namespace configuration, and default language
recommendations.rationale: Packages are installed but not yet configured for use

recommendations.description: Establish locales directory with JSON translation files for each language (e.g., en.json, es.json)
recommendations.rationale: Translation resources need to be defined for the i18n system to function

recommendations.description: Add I18nextProvider component at application root (typically in main.tsx or App.tsx)
recommendations.rationale: Provider initialization is required to make i18n available throughout the React component tree

recommendations.description: Run npm install and test the application to ensure no dependency conflicts
recommendations.rationale: Validate that react@18.2.0 is fully compatible with the newly installed i18n packages

recommendations.description: Create or update project documentation with i18n setup and usage guidelines
recommendations.rationale: Will aid future developers in understanding the internationalization implementation
